dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7599 IH: Traditional Passport Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Lesko introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the issuance of a passport with any gender designation other than male and female, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Traditional Passport Act or the TPA Act.
The Secretary of State may not issue any passport that contains an X gender designation and may permit applicants for passports to select from only Male or Female.
